channel.title: Friend can't connect, and what am I connecting to?

item.title: Friend can't connect, and what am I connecting to?
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

If you are using delta its because you have to change your server.java, client.java(server sided), client.java(client sided) and GUI.java for it to go online.

Read full topic
item.source: Friend can't connect, and what am I connecting to?

item.title: Friend can't connect, and what am I connecting to?
item.dc:creator: @bears371 bears371
item.description:
@bears371 wrote:

So to start off, I am running brokenX v1 [pi]. I went into client.java,searched for server= and got these 2

//server = “”; this one had the 127.0.0 one
server = “”; and this one had 0.0.0.0 somthing like that

my ports are checked and open for sure, I have the no-ip on my computer, but my friend cant connect. I just put my no-ip server name in both of these spaces. He couldnt connect, and I could. So when i was trying to troubleshoot it, I removed both spots where my no-ip name should go, and it still connected me. What am I connecting to? it has to be offline, and its really confusing me!!

Read full topic
item.source: Friend can't connect, and what am I connecting to?
